topic.title: START DATE (CARE PROFESSIONAL ADMITTED CARE EPISODE)
topic.shortdesc: START DATE (CARE PROFESSIONAL ADMITTED CARE EPISODE) is the same as attribute ACTIVITY DATE where the ACTIVITY DATE TYPE is National Code 'Start Date' of the Care Professional Admitted Care Episode.
